info.author: Flaviu Vadan
info.name: hera-workflows
info.summary: Hera is a Python framework for constructing and submitting Argo Workflows. The main goal of Hera is to make Argo Workflows more accessible by abstracting away some setup that is typically necessary for constructing Argo workflows.

info.yanked_reason: Bad release with a bug that causes Hera to not work with a live cluster due to strict pydantic schema. Please update to 5.10.1 instead.

info.summary: Hera makes Python code easy to orchestrate on Argo Workflows through native Python integrations. It lets you construct and submit your Workflows entirely in Python.

info.author: Flaviu Vadan
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.name: hera-workflows
info.summary: Hera makes Python code easy to orchestrate on Argo Workflows through native Python integrations. It lets you construct and submit your Workflows entirely in Python.

info.author: Flaviu Vadan
info.name: hera-workflows
info.summary: Hera is a Python framework for constructing and submitting Argo Workflows. The main goal of Hera is to make Argo Workflows more accessible by abstracting away some setup that is typically necessary for constructing Argo workflows.
